Posts.Content: I guess my opinion is the rate of increase (PSA) and what was your gleason score on the last one???? You never mentioned the gleason (VERY IMPORTANT)! My PSA was 3.0 then two years went to 7.5. Went to a urologist and another showed 9.1 in 45 days from the last. Biopsy was gleason of 8 and HIGH rate. So many things MUST be looked at prior to saying a doctor made a bad decision.
Posts.Title: New Member w/Rising PSA
